basic.Target Organism: [Ref.22883213]Herpesvirus 1 McIntire (HHV-1MC):inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=500 µM);HHV-1 clinical strain:inhibition of virus replication in Vero cells(IC50=1500 µM);Coxsackie virus 971 PT B2:inhibition of virus replication in HEp-2 cells(IC50=1040 µM);inhibition of virus replication in LLC-MK2 cells(IC50=540 µM).
